text: The technician who is supposed to be "in charge" of me has poor work ethics. Texted him to request for rental of cpap but only reply 3 to 4 days after. Understand that there may be many enquiries but a response beyond 2 days is unacceptable. At least tell that he is busy instead of ignoring messages. Also he recommended the wrong mask which caused me to saffocate multiple nights. He only showed me 2 different masks whereas there is supposed to be a third mask which is more ideal for my situation. After responding he said he will contact me again but so far it has been months and no response. Shows a lack of interest and sincerity, and is very unprofessional!

Patrick was very clear with his instructions on how to use the CPAP machine. He walked me through step by step and ensured that I knew what to do. He also shared some tips on the transition of use, which I definitely appreciated. Thumbs up for the great customer service!

Patrick was very friendly and very easy going. He was proficient in his work. He was preparing the wires and machine on me whilst answering all my queries patiently. He is also very detailed and careful to make sure everything is placed properly. He also made sure I was comfortable with all the wires hanging all over me. Thank you for your patience and professional.
Mr Chace is very professional by ensuring that you fully understand & able to operate their equipment/s before leaving. I highly recommend his services. Thanks again Mr Chace!

Patrick was very friendly and nice guy to deal with. He provide me with all details required for the sleep study beforehand so I can prepare myself. The setup took around 20 min, no hassle, all very smooth. Superb service!!
